task.title: 4) Set SBC Server as a Gateway
task.shortdesc: SBC instance can act as a gateway. To send YMP data to the Internet through the SBC gateway, you need to create a route rule.

step.cmd: Log on to the VPC console.
In the left-side navigation pane, click VPC.
Choose the region where the SBC and YMP VPC is created.
Click the ID of the SBC and YMP VPC.
In the left-side VPC Details pane, click VRouter, and then click Add Route Entry.
In the Add Route Entry dialog, set the rule as the figure below and click OK.
